{"id":1525934980,"question_id":3594,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1738284975,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"122 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1525934980/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Identify the Largest Outlier in an Array","memory":"191.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int getLargestOutlier(vector<int>& nums) {\n        unordered_map<int, int> freq;\n        int sum = 0; \n        int res = INT_MIN;\n        for(auto num: nums) {\n            sum+= num;\n            freq[num]++;\n        };\n        for(auto num: nums) {\n            int outlier = sum - num - num;\n            if(freq[outlier] >(outlier==num))\n                res = max(res, outlier);\n        };\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"identify-the-largest-outlier-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
